page.title: 06NEW HOUSING ON CLEE HILL
page.content:
{Park View Estate}on Clee Hill is the only new housing development in our area. The plan is to build 101 bungalows all with a living room, bathroom, kitchen, and two bedrooms. They will have double glazing, central heating, fitted carpets, Telecom and T.V sockets, a car port or garage if desired, and a garden. The central heating will be electricity, oil or solid fuel. There will be no gas because there is no supply running up to Clee Hill. The price range is between Â£27,500 to Â£34,500. This Estate has a beautiful view and is near the common land.
In June 1985 they started to build three bungalows. If they sell well they will build more in the future.
